metadata.dc:author: Viñuela, B
Adriazola Semino, M
Lozano Ortega, J L
García Cobo, E
Tejeda Bañez, E
Romero Rodríguez, F
metadata.dc:description: Description of one case of spontaneous fistulization between a renal calix and a descending colon, secondary to lithiasic pyonephrosis. Diagnosis was carried out by means of ascending pyelography without it being clinically suspected. Treatment is surgical, combining nephrectomy, fistula resection and closure of the colic gap. Etiology, favouring factors, diagnosis and treatment are explained.
metadata.dc:title: Fistula renocólica espontánea secundaria a pionefrosis de etiología litiásica.
[Spontaneous renocolic fistula secondary to pyonephrosis of lithiasic etiology].
